poem:
**Project 2025: The Forgotten Tie**

Shadows in the playbook, a dance of the sly,
Silken threads of power, Trump whispers: "not I."
Yet in the veiled corridors, policy takes flight,
Phantom hands move pieces, cloaked in the night.
Ancient alliances, remembered or not,
In the game of thrones, truth's easily forgot.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Project 2025: inside Trump’s ties to the rightwing policy playbook Donald Trump’s attempt to distance himself from Project 2025 after extreme comments from one of its leaders falls flat given the extensive Trump ties and similarities between the project’s policy ideas and the former president’s platform. On Truth Social last week, Trump claimed to “know nothing about Project 2025” and have “no idea who is behind it”. The disavowal from Trump came after Kevin Roberts,". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
